sentences.sContent: The production of xylose via hydrolysis of straw in a mixture of formic acid and hydrochloric acid was investigated.
sentences.sContent_eng: The production of xylose via hydrolysis of straw in a mixture of formic acid and hydrochloric acid was investigated.
sentences.sCn: 本文对甲酸-盐酸混合溶液水解麦草制备木糖的工艺进行研究。

trans.tranOther: a strong acid used especially in industry
